sentences.en: A female audience to baffle, smiling to lift a coke.
sentences.cn: 一位女观众走到挡板后, 笑着举起了一听可乐.

sentences.en: Also, the stone itself will not jump up to baffle you.
sentences.cn: 同样的, 那块石头自己,也不会忽然间跳起来跟你为难.

sentences.en: Baffle — a device used to deflect material flow in a desired direction.
sentences.cn: 挡板—是一种改变物质到设定方向的一种装置.

sentences.en: I do not therefore baffle the reader with disputable statistics.
sentences.cn: 因此,我不想拿一些值得争论的统计数字来为难读者.

sentences.en: In addition, the correlations of for some better impeller - baffle - sparger combinations were obtained.
sentences.cn: 此外, 给出了几种较好桨型 - 挡板 - 分布环组合的临界搅拌转速关联式.

sentences.en: Philosophy and abstract thinking baffle them.
sentences.cn: 哲学和抽象思维这些东西会令他们大惑不解.

sentences.en: Production practice proved that this new rod baffle is successful.
sentences.cn: 经实践检验,该结构的折流栅是可行的.

sentences.en: Radial flow type. Gaining large cycle flow with baffle's cooperation.
sentences.cn: 径流型, 配合挡板可得上下循环流,循环量大,剪切作用好.

sentences.en: Seldon, as he ran, bounded from side to side to baffle and deceive their aim.
sentences.cn: 塞尔登一会儿跳到这边,一会儿跳到那边跑着, 搞乱和干扰他们的目标.

sentences.en: She had then offered him the chance to baffle his doom.
sentences.cn: 当时她向他提供战胜厄运的机会.

sentences.en: Sideboard connecting screws are made on two ends of the baffle.
sentences.cn: 挡板两端制有边板连接螺丝.

sentences.en: The flow pattern used finger - type baffle was beneficial to suspension of particles.
sentences.cn: 指型挡板对颗粒的悬浮非常有利.

sentences.en: The presence of a baffle lock appears to override Ms Martin's autonomy.
sentences.cn: 设置障碍似乎践踏了马丁女士的自主性.
这个问题把我彻底难倒了。

sentences.en: There are a number of factors that baffle its development.
sentences.cn: 还有着很多因素阻碍着我国新闻周刊的发展.

sentences.en: Withal, many biologists persist in evolutionism fell into a dilemma baffle.
sentences.cn: 对此, 许多坚持进化论的生物学家都陷入了进退维谷的困惑之中.

words.tran_cn: 令人困惑的；阻碍的；令人丧气的；变幻的

trans.tran_en: a board, sheet of metal etc that controls the flow of air, water, or sound into or out of something
if something baffles you, you cannot understand or explain it at all
